record.title: EXECUTIVE SESSION

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to executive session, that the HELP Committee be discharged from further consideration of the nomination of Williamson Evers to be Assistant Secretary at the Department of Education, PN 230; that the nomination be confirmed, the motion to reconsider be laid on the table, the President be immediately notified of the Senate's action and the Senate then return to legislative session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The nomination considered and confirmed is as follows:
Williamson Evers, of California to be Assistant Secretary for Planning, Evaluation, and Policy Development.
